data.title: Amber Alexander on LinkedIn: I continue to be so grateful for the community of MN Talent leaders that…
data.meta_description: I continue to be so grateful for the community of MN Talent leaders that Ryan Dunn and team bring together quarterly! Every meeting I’m energized by the…
data.text:
This case study on culture and leadership is worth a listen! It's inspiring to hear from senior leaders who view culture, and culture evolution, as a business imperative and a pivotal enabler of their strategy. Some sticky concepts for me: 1) Spending minutes on the "how" (e.g., talent processes and culture) needs to be proportionate to the minutes spent on the "what" (the strategy) 2) Leader reflection "at the end of the day, would I want to be led by me?" If the answer is no, what should I do to show up differently tomorrow? 3) The incredible velocity that is possible when senior leaders (including the CEO) are in lockstep with what the culture needs to be and willing to commit the time to connect it to their desired business outcomes.

Only ONE day left to seize your chance at the Business Hunter Awards! ⏳The clock is ticking, and this is your final opportunity to be part of a prestigious event that celebrates business excellence in our region. Entering the Business Hunter Awards is more than just a competition—it's a platform to elevate your business, gain recognition, and connect with industry leaders. Why should you enter? 📣 Boost your brand: Gain unparalleled visibility and credibility in the business community. 📣 Showcase your success: Highlight your achievements in categories like Innovation, Sustainability, and Leadership. 📣 Connect and network: Join a community of like-minded professionals and industry experts. 📣 Receive valuable feedback: Benefit from the insights of our esteemed panel of judges, who bring a wealth of knowledge and experience. Categories include: 🌟 Outstanding Employee 🌟 Kristen Keegan Young Business Leader 🌟 Excellence in Innovation 🌟 Excellence in Sustainability 🌟 And many more! Remember, entries close TOMORROW at 5pm. Don’t miss this opportunity to shine and propel your business to new heights. Submit your entry now and be a part of something extraordinary! https://buff.ly/3XaPj1M

Integrating "general" purpose technologies with the situated practices, established systems of values, and shared understandings that define organizations. This is one of the key challenges of #AI #implementation. Several tensions emerge in this process, making the impact assessment of such technologies much more complex than commonly believed. With Nathan Perrott, Daniel Pfeiffer, and Steven Ehrlich, we explored some of these issues. I'm grateful to Radancy Europe for inviting me to join this panel at the Talent Acquisition Leaders Day. The interaction between research and practice is fundamental to generating new ideas to navigate these challenges 🚀

🚀 Exciting Times! We just hosted a Two-Day Summit for our Regional Business Development Managers @SAMSON CERA, the experts in Ceramic solutions in more challenging applications! 🌐 Dear LinkedIn community, I’d like to share with you my experiences. We had an enriching two-day summit with our exceptional team of Regional Business Development Managers. 🌍 🤝 Purpose: The goal of this meeting is to foster collaboration within our global organization, exchanging insights and aligning strategies for future growth. It reflects the exceptional talent driving our company, always focused on markets, customers, and partners to deliver successful and competitive solutions, exemplified by SAMSON 📈 Agenda Highlights: Day 1: Strategic Planning 2024 and Market Trends Analysis together with our Industry Managers Day 2: Skill Development Workshops and Team Building Activities 🌐 Global Perspectives: With diverse backgrounds and experiences, our RBDMs bring a wealth of knowledge to the table. We're excited to leverage this diversity to explore new opportunities and address challenges. 🤔 Open Discussions: This summit is all about open dialogue, brainstorming and evaluating our actions. We discuss industry trends, innovative approaches and how we can best serve our customers and partners with solutions and new opportunities in the constantly evolving business landscape. 👥 Team Building: Beyond business, we'll be strengthening our bonds through team-building exercises and networking opportunities. After all, a united team is a powerful force. 🎉 Celebrating Success: We'll also take time to acknowledge and celebrate the achievements of our RBDM team. Your dedication and hard work don't go unnoticed! 🙌 Gratitude: A big shoutout to our incredible RBDMs who continuously drive our business growth. Your commitment is the backbone of our success. 🔗 Stay Tuned: I'll be sharing updates and insights from the summit. Follow along for a behind-the-scenes look at the discussions and activities shaping the future of our business. Here's to two days of collaboration, innovation, and building a stronger future together! For our customers and partners and for SAMSON 🚀 #BusinessDevelopment #TeamBuilding #Leadership #Innovation #CompanyCulture #SAMSONGROUP #ONESAMSON #SAMSONCERA #CERASYSTEM

If you were a part of our Global Operational Excellence deployment between 2005 and 2019, I would love to hear from you! As I reflect on high performance talent and teams, I am curious about your perspective. Did your involvement make a positive difference in your career? How has it changed your thinking about high performing teams? If someone asked you whether the investment of your time and energy was worth it, what would you say? Share your feedback and thoughts with me in the comments below. #operationalexcellence #cardinalhealth #highperformanceteams #grndublin

This week Grads of Life hosted an interactive discussion with cross-sector leaders on the value and ROI of skills-first talent practices. Insights centered on: 1) Buy-in for skills-first transformation cannot just be at the C-suite (whether CHRO/CDO/CEO) but across the top/bottom and all levels of the organization. 2) To have skills-first commitments move to action – ROI metrics and stories must be tailored to change agents across the organization. Hiring managers are the critical unlock - messaging needs to focus on what helps them be successful such as increased productivity with skills-first hiring, and cost savings of reduced turnover and internal mobility. 3) What GOL has been advocating for years - hiring managers, HR, etc. - those doing the work every day - need support, tools, and the space to discuss their concerns and hopes! Thank you and appreciation to our panelists representing so many GOL partners over the past 10 years Bank of America Blackstone United Airlines Walmart SHRM Foundation Business Roundtable OneTen Harvard Business School And thank you to exceptional GOL team planning this event! – Tori, Kayla, Kelly, Laura, Elyse Finally, check out SkillsSpeak.org an insightful - but quick! - read on how employers in their own words are finding, hiring, and growing skills-first talent!
